title: How will the EWS quota affect the general candidates for the JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: On January 08, 2019, Lok Sabha has passed the constitutional amendment bill enabling 10% reservation for economically weaker sections in the general category. Based on the above bill, general category students whose family annual income is less than Rs. 8 lakh will be eligible. If the government wants to increase the reservation to 59% by including 10% quota for economically weaker sections in the general category, a constitutional amendment has to be made for Article 15 & 16 of Indian Constitution. So HRD ministry announced that it will implement a 10% reservation of the general category from the 2019 academic session and an increase of around 25 percent seats in higher education will compensate above requirement without disturbing current Quota system,
